name: Cubic Evolution
description:
A adventure game that develops over time.The world changes the further you go and becomes more realistic or as we like to call it the less corrupted  items.Every thing will change as you progress, you the player, world, the game play ,items, others .

We are currently  taking lots of time into the game play and the level design .We want to have progress levels or chapters.Cubic Evolution is a small project right now but our idea is to have that change and make it so is huge.We don't want to spoil anything like the levels or changes since it has not been added but is a idea.The chapters will be set in different progress as at now we don't have the level or progress level save done, we are working on it.The game  has many bugs but we are ready to go head to head with them.Please any new bugs found comment at us.We want to develop the game for mobile as well.

We thank you for playing .
